info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:16AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Heavy Rainfall Possible this Morning... Showers and thunderstorms were rapidly developing across Central and North Central Montana this morning, with further development expected through the remainder of the morning hours. These showers and thunderstorms have been very slow moving, and in some cases were nearly stationary. Rainfall rates of a quarter of an inch to nearly one and a half inches per hour have been observed beneath these showers and storms. Motorist should be prepared for rapidly changing conditions over short distances, with the potential for significant reductions in visibility in areas of heavy rainfall. Additionally, the heavy rainfall may lead to ponding of water in driving lanes, increasing the threat for hydroplaning.
